Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameState
public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
The GameState is the core of the model, from this class you can reach every class of the model. There is a GameState's instance for each different lobby. Every instances are independent by other one.
See Also:
IslandBoard, Player, GodsFactory
